abstract.original_text: The Ebola virus disease outbreak in West Africa was unprecedented in both its scale and impact. Out of this human calamity has come renewed attention to global health security-its definition, meaning, and the practical implications for programmes and policy. For example, how does a government begin to strengthen its core public health capacities, as demanded by the International Heymann et al.

Out of this human calamity has come renewed attention to global health security-its definition ,
meaning , and the practical implications for programmes and policy .
For example , how does a government begin to strengthen its core public health capacities ,
as demanded by the International Heymann et al. .
